bugs.title: No Acceptance Criteria Provided
bugs.detail: The acceptance criteria list is empty, making it impossible to determine if the application meets the necessary requirements.

bugs.title: Invalid URL for Testing
bugs.detail: The URL 'http://localhost:8000' is a local environment URL and cannot be accessed for testing purposes from an external automated testing system.

suggestions: Provide a comprehensive list of acceptance criteria to enable proper testing and validation of the application.
Ensure the application is deployed to a publicly accessible environment for external testing, or provide access to the local environment.
